member.name: M:ATMTest.ATMClass.Withdraw(System.Int32)
member.summary: withdraw money from ATM. Just return amount for now.

member.name: M:ATMTest.ATMClass.Inventory
member.summary: list the inventory in the ATM. make sure to cast to a list when calling.
member.returns: a tuple list listing the label and value in each drawer

member.name: P:ATMTest.ATMDrawer.value
member.summary: the value of each bill in the drawer

member.name: P:ATMTest.ATMDrawer.inventory
member.summary: the number of bills in the drawer

member.name: P:ATMTest.ATMDrawer.TotalValue
member.summary: the total value of this drawer.
